评论详情: This hoodie came in a vacuumed sealed package so the packaging material was minimal. The size is a perfect fit as I like to order slightly larger to account for shrinking in the dryer. The color was spot on. I think the material is a little thinner then a store bought sweatshirt but that's ok. I'm looking forward to wearing it as it seems very comfortable.

Heavy duty material, but soft too. I'm always skeptical about ordering clothes online so I rely heavily on reviews especially reviews with pictures. I buy most of my tops from Aerie because I love their oversized fit. This hoodie may just be my favorite!! Really good quality. I love the acid wash. For oversized tops I'm usually a L..I bought this in an XL because I wasn't sure of the material/quality and it's perfect. Also I bought the bright pink color and it's true to picture.

Purchased for my teenager and we both love it. It’s soft and oversized. Has the “worn look” to it but in all the right ways! Fabric was actually thicker than I expected therefore giving it 5 stars for quality. Exactly what we were looking for.

Fits like the perfect boyfriend, oversized hoodie. I’m 5’6”, 125lbs. I ordered the size small. Thick and soft fabric. High quality for the price! Similar quality to high end active brands such as Vuori. It does have a distressed look, which I like. The wrist cuffs and waist cuff have little tears to create the distressed/vintage effect.

I love this sweatshirt! Love the color and the size. I ordered a size small and with it being oversized, it’s the perfect fit. No need to size up or down. The material is great and the inside is super soft. So cute and comfy! I will be ordering more in other colors, definitely recommend.
Material is great. Comfy and will be wearing this 24/7
Great quality.
Size down if you want less of an oversized fit
This is my favorite hoodie! I like my sweatshirts oversized, so I got it in a L. It fit like an XL usually fits on me, but I love it. It is so warm, soft, and comfortable. 100% recommend!!
I ordered a medium but when I got the product it fit like a XXL

This hoodie is a little overpriced but trust me when I say this is my best quality hoodie I love everything about it.

Seems to be good quality material and is soft and pretty thick and warm. The fit is a little big. The price was good though. This was bought as a gift and they like it.

They even say in the package it will be wrinkled. So, I took it out of the packaging and ironed it ( inside out to avoid heat marks) and the shirt was great. She was very happy with it. Recommend it.

If you know, you know. This hoodie is the perfect balance between oversized but not drowning you. The box fit is amazing and it is SO WARM!! I love love love the outside material as well. If you’re debating - click that “buy” button!!!!!
This product had tiny rips and holes all along the hood, cuffs and waistband. Returned it. This is a terrible product don't buy it.

This was a gift for my daughter.  She loves it.  Says it is very soft and comfy.  Got her a medium which is little large on her.  She likes her hoodies on the bigger side.  Remember if you want it better fitting.

Love this color. It's thick, warm and oversized. I love everything about it. Worth the money.

My new favorite sweatshirt. It’s thick and so soft.
My 16 year old daughter purchased and absolutely loves this sweatshirt.  They are really thick and good quality.  They were worth the money.

The color is perfect and I wear it probably every other day. It's super comfy and fits well and has a nice wide hood that doesn't make you look like an egg

I can’t remember the last time I ordered a hoodie and actually received a high quality material that was comfortable and felt like it could last for years. That’s how this hoodie fits. I get compliments on it all of the time.

I’m obsessed with this sweatshirt. I love the distressed look and it’s super comfy! Little on the pricey side but definitely worth it.

I don’t think I’ve ever reviewed a product before, but I had to on this. Bought for my teenage daughter, just came back to buy 2 for myself. The distressed look is 🔥 & they are so incredibly soft!!! Well made, comfortable, & beautiful colors!

Obsessed with these oversized hoodies- I came back and bought in another color. I’m 5’5” about 138 and sized up to a M for a bigger fit and it’s perfect. So cozy and I get tons of compliments. I love the worn look these have. I have blue and pink!!!
very good material and love the color and very warm and worth the money!
It's cozy and color is exactly what I wanted and looked like the pic. A little overpriced but it's exactly what I wanted so I'll be ordering some more colors 💯 Red is fireeee

I’m obsessed with this hoodie!! Wash it before you decide if you like it or not. I got a size medium (my normal size) and it is perfectly oversized. I’ll be living in this all winter.

i love this hoodie soooo much!! it’s so soft and thick, keeps me warm 24/7. the wash is perfect, and the slightly distressed cuffs and hood are chefs kiss 😽 the fit is also great - as a 5,5 girly i got size small and it’s perfff
love love love

I love this sweatshirt so much. I’m 5’2” and wear an XL in most tops. I bought an XL hoodie and it’s the perfect amount of oversize!  It’s soft on the inside and super cozy. The quality is amazing, nice and thick. The navy is a great color and I love the “worn” look. I also bought a pink one and it’s just as nice.
I got the hot pink one and it’s really cute, vibrant color. It oversized pretty well. However if you’re buying don’t expect the fade look to come with. It was a solid pink. Worth it anyway though
The acid wash is not on any of the main section of the hoodie. Only slightly acid washed on the hood and the hem.

评论概述: Love just wish it wasn't so long
评论详情: This hoodie is SO comfy. It reminds me of my White Fox hoodies. The bottom isn't too tight, the cuffs on the sleeves aren't tight. Despite other reviews, I personally don't think the neck hole is too tight. The only thing I'm not huge on is how long it is (I am 4'11 though so I have a short torso). I ordered a medium and a small because I wasn't sure how it'd fit me. I didn't even try the medium on because it looked waaay too big.  Pictures are of a small on me. I'm hoping it will shrink a little bit in the laundry.  Like I said I'm 4'11 and about 140-145lbs. Usually I get a medium in hoodies that aren't oversize.

The sweatshirt is fine, oversized, thick - but it did not hold up in the wash. It came vacuum sealed in a tight little brick form. Upon opening the package it was very wrinkled and had a slight smell. I washed it - cold water, 1 Tide pod, 60 min in dryer. It came out bleached and faded looking but only on the body. The front and back of the shirt are faded but the hood and arms are completely fine. I don’t know if it’s part of the ‘distressing’ or if the dye didn’t hold up.
I recieved more of a hot pink not a light pink like the photo/I was expecting

评论概述: 10/10 A Little Pricey but Worth It
评论详情: This is my absolute favorite hoodie. I can't believe I am such a big fan of a $50 hoodie but it's so worth it. No string that gets lost in the dryer, the perfect thickness to be comfy and maintain quality, and the colors are super cute, just ordered another one in black!
Did not expect it to be that good since Amazon is pretty tricky when it comes to clothes but this was beyond my expectations, it’s so comfy, soft and great material
My daughter loved the fabric and comfort
This sweatshirt is a must! It's so soft and comfortable. I have already purchased 2 and 1 more for a gift!

This hoodie HOODIES. Perfect for fall, super thick and soft and has that nice vintage distressed feel that people spend years washing their hoodies to get. I’m 5’7 and got a small and it’s still oversized enough to have that “boyfriend’s sweatshirt feel”. Well worth $50 IMO
This hoodie hoodies
I wear it all the time! Super cozy and soft. Great hoodie cut.

评论概述: This is the best sweatshirt I have ever owned
评论详情: Let me tell you how amazing this sweatshirt is, it's soft, and bulky but not too much and plain so it goes with everything.  I wear this sweatshirt on all chilly days. It's the best one I have ever owned.
So glad I ordered a small it is the perfect oversized and heavy weight hoodie, I love the distressed acid wash look and the material is so soft and comfortable!!
This is such a thick, warm, & cozy hoodie! Perfect for winter. Fits very comfortably, & I like the unique style of the neck. Nice dark blue color.  Incredibly high quality!

The FAIABLE Women's Oversized Hoodie delivers on comfort and style with its generous fit and soft, cozy fabric, making it a reliable choice for casual days or lounging at home. The design is simple yet versatile, perfect for layering or wearing solo on cooler days. Overall, it's a practical addition to any wardrobe seeking comfort without sacrificing aesthetic appeal.

评论概述: A very soft and heavyweight hoodie
评论详情: I highly recommend this item if you need an oversized, very soft hoodie. Be fair that it is large, but it is meant to be that way. It’s super soft and comfortable. I’ve slept in it a few times. It is a little bit heavier, so I would only wear it in fall or winter; it comes in various colors and is as good as an option if you like hoodies.

I couldn’t be happier with this oversized hoodie! I love the vibrant color and the stylish oversized fit. The quality is certainly above average and the material is very comfortable and warm. It doesn’t fade or shrink after washing. The affordable price tag makes this a great value. Highly recommend!
My wife is camera shy but she loves this hoodie, it is very soft and cozy so she wears it all the time in the house, cause she is always freezing. Definitely a great buy.
This is a nice comfortable fit. It is a nice medium weight. It isade out of good quality material and so warm. I love the color choices. The elastic keeps it sharp.

评论概述: Cute for a quick target run
评论详情: Its cute and simple. Definitely a cute vibe for a target run during fall

评论概述: FAIABLE Womens Oversized Hoodie Couples Heavyweight Hoodies Vintage Acid Wash Hoodie
评论详情: This si a wonderful hoodie. It's really thick and heavyweight and so so soft

Great oversized hoodie! Come fall I will absolutely be living in this. I love the faded black as it will add a bit of contrast to my normally all black outfits lol. It's not too heavyweight but it does keep you warm and cozy without overheating. I'm hoping that this holds up well after some washes bc its going in the favorite pile!

I'm petite, under 5 foot, so I bought the x-small, and I'm SO glad I did! It's still quite long, but the sleeves fit perfectly, and the fullness is also quite perfect. It's soft and washes well with no shrinkage, and is thick and warm and so comfy for those chilly summer evenings. An all-around great sweatshirt, it has become a favorite for sure!
Soft and fluffy, perfectly oversized for snuggling on the couch with a book. Love the pretty pink color.

评论概述: This is now my all time favorite hoodie
评论详情: Hoodies seem to be really costly lately.  This oversized hoodie is the perfection.  I ordered a LARGE pink and it is awesome.  The length is long, it goes down under my butt.  The sleeves are nice and long. The hood is huge and fit my head, even with my hair in a bun.  The color is gorgeous.  The material is nice and thick- soft and fuzzy on the inside of the hoodie.  I washed and dried it and it did shrink a little bit but is still huge.  The pocket in the front if nice to carry things or tuck my hands to warm them.  I wear this as my comfy, relaxing hoodie almost every night.  HIGHLY recommend this hoodie for the price.

评论概述: Cozy casual warm. Gorgeous vintage look.
评论详情: This hoodie is nicely oversized. Very casual with lots of room. Very cozy and warm. I like the vintage acid wash look. The material is soft and breathable. I like they way it looks with jeans. It's well made. The stitching is excellent. The hood is generous and fits nicely. Overall, very happy with it.

评论概述: My New Favorite Sweatshirt, Super Comfortable
评论详情: Ok, I want one in every color! I wear sweatshirts almost every day, except in the summertime. We live in the mountains, so it's usually cooler weather in the morning and evening time - meaning I am throwing on a sweatshirt. This hoodie is by far the most comfortable one I own. It's so soft, and a little bit thicker than an average sweatshirt. It has a distressed finish to it - so the color is faded in some areas and the sleeves have a worn look to them - that's the style and just adds to this wonderful piece of clothing. It's like wearing a sweatshirt that you've owned for years - but without having to spend the years to make it have that worn look. This is now my go-to hoodie to wear, meaning I am going to buy more - so I'm happy they come in so many colors! The price point is a little bit higher, but I think it's totally worth it. It's a durable, comfortable hoodie.

Yo, this hoodie is AMAZING! I just got it today and cannot wait to wear it out. I'll be getting more colors. It is an oversized fit. I still ordered a women's XL because I like mine extremely oversized. It's my style. The pink color is exactly as vivid as pictured. It felt amazing when I tried it on. Almost has a vintage vibe. Highly recommend!

First off, unlike most acid washed hoodies, this one is sooooo soft! The inside texture is almost but not quite fleece. The outside still has that rugged feel and look.  It's huge and roomy, too, so you can throw it on over just about anything, or just sit around on a chilly day wearing just this and stay toasty.  It's also very well made, so it's not going to come apart or last just one season. This one's a keeper!

This sweatshirt is incredibly soft and comfortable. It runs on the big side which I love! I hate a tight sweatshirt.  The inside is really soft too. The front pocket is nice and big. This is one of those sweatshirts I will be wearing every chance I get.

评论概述: This one is a must have….
评论详情: I don’t even know where to start with this hoodie!! The material is… absolutely the best I’ve ever felt in a hoodie…EVER. The inside is so soft and out of this world that it feels like the most comforting hug you’ve ever needed. I ordered the black and the coloring on the cuffs, neckline and bottom hem are lightly acid washed and worn and it is so tastefully and perfectly done.  Sizing is perfect - I ordered my normal size and it is perfectly oversized and the arms are the perfect length. I will note also that the sleeves can be pulled up - I have hoodies where the cuff is tight and will only pull up to my lower forearm and it freaks me out for some reason - I need to be able to smoothly pull my sleeves up and this hoodie gives me what I need. Overall I am in love… I didn’t know hoodies like this existed. I’m going to be ordering more colors and definitely need one of their crew necks! Buy it!!

评论概述: Hated at first...  Now i Love it
评论详情: Was monumentally disappointed when I received this. Looked like some well-worn, fat old guys sweater from the goodwill. Cast it aside.  Got cold one day. It was the nearest thing to hand, so put it on and OOOhhhhhhhh....  It literally feels like a comforting, warm cloud is softly hugging you. It makes you happy.  Amazing.

First I'll just say the one thing I don't like about this hoodie is I have to pull it off my neck often. At least I noticed that when I'm driving. I'm an Uber driver so I drive a lot. I haven't noticed it otherwise, though. So don't necessarily let that deter you from ordering.  Now that that's out of the way, I love this hoodie! The color is amazing. I love how soft and comfortable it is. I've worn it without a shirt in 50° and it kept me warm. The inside material feels incredible on my skin. It's not a oversized on me as it is on the model. But it is still oversized. It's my new favorite hoodie. I plan on buying my daughter one, because she loves oversized hoodies. I certainly recommend!

One might wonder what warrants a $50 price tag on a sweatshirt but all you have to do is feel the fabric and know this is something different.  I washed it right away as I was afraid the color could wash off onto my clothes if I wore it.  It washed up great and got the little fuzzies inside.  The pink color is very pretty, and there are areas on the sweatshirt that show the acid wash.  There are little wear holes along the hood and around the hem on the bottom.  I am a size 10 and I took a medium.  It is a great fit, definitely loose.  If I wanted an even sloppier look (I know that is the wrong word to use), I could even have sized up one more size.  The medium is great though, the sleeves are long enough and that is really what matters to me.  As someone else said, the neck hole is a bit tight.  It doesn't bother me, but I have to tug a bit to get it over my head.  I may take a scissors and slit an opening to make it bigger.  The best thing about this sweatshirt though is the feel of it.  The outside has a buttery feel to it, and makes you really want to snuggle into it.

This is indeed heavy duty. It was HEAVY in it's package... Key thing to note that this is acid washed so it looks weathered, which I like. But if you want something that looks pristine and new, don't buy this. It is very heavy and warm and will be great when the weather gets drizzly and gross. Very spacious but true to size.
This hoodie is huge and super comfortable. Works great with leggings on the weekend!

I love this sweatshirt. It's perfect for lounging at home, or going somewhere that it's ok to be comfortable. Usually I wear a L or XL. I ordered a M and it's really big and comfy. I think, even for an oversized sweatshirt, it runs quite large. It's so comfortable and a beautiful bright pink color. It's soft and I have already worn it several times. It's good for putting over your jammies if you need to take your dog out, or just to take the chill out. Love this sweatshirt. I am going to look to see if there are other colors I can buy.
